Travel is not just about getting from on: Jàngalekati bu leer du muy démb ñàkk sa bopp ci benn ga, dinañu xam ni xaalis day doy waaru xeetu sa xibaar.
CHMP Ride transforms everyday travel int: CHMP Ride defar ci biir yooni démbal yu bees yu rafet, bu seetlu woon, te bu rafet ci seen xel. Bu ngeen dem liggéey, bu ngeen amal ab bés bu rafet ak xarit yi, wala bu ngeen dem fi cofeel, nu ngi def suuful dem yim ci dundu yi yu am solo ak rafet.

Designed to match the pace of your life,: Dafa sax ci yoonu dund bi nga am, nu ngi ci kaw sa hopp yu ndaw, ak dem yu votes, ci yooni pig mi, ak lépp li ci biir. Benn app, yu bari yooni — lépp tey rafet.
Using CHMP Ride is simple, intuitive, an: Sax na am CHMP Ride: bu yaggul, bu am solo, bu jaar ci seen xel. Dul sa app, defar sa destination, te wone ay opsiyon yu am solo ci sama ref ak budget.

With features like real-time updates, dr: Ak ay jafe‑jàmm bii ci defaru realtime updates, ratings ci driver yi, ak support instant, dinga taxawu seen jëf ci biir démbal bi bu fees. Ñaan CHMP Ride — te démb ak jafe-jàmm.

Don't wait in taxi lines: Bul taxaw ci rëdd taxi yi
Items to keep in your vehicle: Li dafa wara nekk ci sa wàllukaay
TNDL (only if your province require): TNDL (su sa province laaj ko rekk)
Have questions about our Privacy Policy?: Am nga laaj ci sunu Politique de confidentialité?
Review Chmp, Insurance Policy here. Not: Xoolal policy Chmp, Assurance fii. Du ñépp ci policies assurance wàllukaay bu bopp ñu man a roof dox ci companies transport network yi mel ni Chmp. Seetal sa fournisseur assurance ngir am lu gëna baax.
Register and take the online course on D: Inscription ak jël kursu ci internet ci Docebo
the city of Edmonton requires that all d: Dëkk Edmonton dafa laaj ne jëfandikukat yépp war nañu jot ci Edmonton Driver Training ngir doxal
If your name isn't on your document or i: Su sa tur nekkul ci sa jukki walla ci carte d'assurance, da nga wara jox ay confirmation ci sa assurance provider walla policy holder ngir nga man a jëfandikoo wàllukaay bi ci rideshare.
Vehicle's make, model, and year: Fabrique wàllukaay bi, model, ak at
Welcome to Canada Halal. These Terms and: Dalal ak jàmm ci Canada Halal. Njàngat ak Mbay yii moo taxawal sa jëfandikoo sunu dalub web, sunu mbay ak sunu sarwiis. Su fekkee dangaa dugg walla jëfandikoo Canada Halal, da ngay nangu ci mbiri njàngat yii. Su fekkee dangaa bañ benn ciy njàngat yii, buleen jëfandikoo sunu sarwiis yi.
Canada Halal is committed to providing a: Canada Halal dafa bëgg liggéey ci joxal mbay ak sarwiis yu Halal bu dëgg te ñu nangoo ci seen bind, ngir mucc ci ay standard yu gëna kawe ci ciy kër giiru lekkal Islam.
Permission is granted to temporarily dow: Saa yu kenn am na ndigël ngir yebal benn koppi ci ay njàngat yu nekk ci dalub web bu Canada Halal, ngir jëfandikoo bu bopp, te du ngir njariñu liggéey. Li mooy ndigël bu jëfandikookat, du jox ci yaw ci tur, te ci ndigël bii yaa wara baña def:
Modify or copy the materials: Soppi walla defarati ay njàngat yi
Use the materials for any commercial pur: Jëfandikoo njàngat yi ngir liggéey njariñu yoon
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer: Jéem a dëppalee walla def lu am solo ci xam-xam bu software bu nekk ci dalu Canada Halal
Remove any copyright or other proprietar: Màbbal turu copyright walla lu am njàngat bu jot ci njàngat yi
Transfer the materials to another person: Jox njàngat yi ci beneen nit walla def seen 'miroir' ci beneen server
This license shall automatically termina: Ndax bu fekkee dangaa sukkandiku ci benn ci ay xew-xew yii, ndigël bii day taxaw, te Canada Halal mën na sàq ndigël bii ci benn saa su nekk.
Canada Halal guarantees that all product: Canada Halal dafay taxawal ne mbay yépp yu am sunu marku bind Halal ñu seet nañu leen bu baax, te ñu ci mucc ci yoonu Islam ngir Halal. Sunu yoonu bind mooy am ci:
Inspection of facilities and manufacturi: Seetlu ci tooli liggéey ak yooni defar
Verification of ingredients and supplier: Wóorlu ci ay xeltéef ak ay joxkat
Ongoing monitoring and periodic re-certi: Soriwul seetlu ak bindu yeneeni jamono
Adherence to our strict quality control: Sàmmal sunu yoon yu dëgër ci nangu weeru mbay
The unauthorized use of our certificatio: Jëfandikoo sunu marku bind Halal bu ñu joxul ndigël dafay ñuul bu baax te mën na yóbbu ci yooni njariñu yoon.
Have questions about our Terms and Condi: Ndax am nga laaj ci sunu Njàngat ak Mbay?
